text: Dung i ro ma hata ni baoa i tu ahu: Ale anak ni jolma, ida ma marhitehite matam, jala tangihon ma marhitehite pinggolmu, jala parateatehon ma saluhut na naeng pataridahononku tu ho, ai ala naeng pataridahononhon tu ho umbahen tarboan ho tuson; baritahon ma saluhut na niidam tu pinompar ni Israel.
